sections.title: Main Headline
sections.content: Bob Johnson vs Smith & Jones, LLC

sections.title: Hero Description
sections.content: If you received unwanted calls or text messages from Smith & Jones, LLC between January 1, 2020 and December 31, 2023, you may be entitled to compensation under this class action settlement.

sections.title: Settlement Description
sections.content: This settlement resolves claims that Smith & Jones, LLC violated the Telephone Consumer Protection Act (TCPA) by making unwanted calls and sending unwanted text messages to consumers.

sections.title: Eligibility Criteria
sections.content:
You are eligible if you:
• Received calls or texts from Smith & Jones, LLC
• Between January 1, 2020 and December 31, 2023
• To your cellular telephone
• Without your express written consent

sections.title: About This Settlement
sections.content: This class action lawsuit alleged that Smith & Jones, LLC violated federal law by making unwanted calls and sending unwanted text messages. Smith & Jones, LLC denies any wrongdoing but has agreed to settle to avoid the cost and uncertainty of continued litigation.
